SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE date = #{currentDate} AND start_time <= TIME(#{currentTime}) AND end_time >= TIME(#{currentTime})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule(id, classroom_id, course_id, week_day, start_time, end_time, date) VALUES(#{id}, #{classroomId}, #{courseId}, #{weekDay}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{date})
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET classroom_id=#{classroomId}, course_id=#{courseId}, week_day=#{weekDay}, start_time=#{startTime}, end_time=#{endTime}, date=#{date} WHERE id=#{id}
